title: Getting started
description: Getting started
---

## Getting started

Control the features of the IBM Video Streaming player and customize its layout, while maintaining a continuous, interactive data connection with IBM Video Streaming’s backend. Embed the player anywhere and manage it according to your needs and preferences.

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: Getting started
description: Getting started
---

## Getting started

Control the features of the IBM Video Streaming player and customize its layout, while maintaining a continuous, interactive data connection with IBM Video Streaming’s backend. Embed the player anywhere and manage it according to your needs and preferences.
